import React, {useState} from 'react'; import './taco.css'; const Taco = props => { const [order, setOrder] = useState({ name: '', size: 0, avo: '', onions: '', pico: '', sauce: '', special: '' }) const handleChange = e => { setOrder({...order, [e.target.name]: e.target.type === 'checkbox' ? e.target.checked : e.target.value}) console.log(order) } return (

Build your taco

) } export default Taco;
